name: Simply-Delicious Tamari Almond Green Beans
author: HEYKEVBO
summary: I whipped this together for my wife one night and she keeps asking for it! It's a simple dish to make. The tamari and almonds go great with the green beans.  I do not like green beans, but tend to enjoy a couple sometimes.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen French-cut green beans
directions: Lightly spray a skillet with cooking spray and set over medium heat
Place the green beans in the skillet; cook and stir until cooked through, about 8 minutes
Continue to cook and stir until the green beans are lightly browned
